title: how do i hide or disable youtube videos from my client
body:
like you know that massive youtube layout on your home screen not only it slows down my client but currently there's a creepy thumbnail right now of a weird face shopped on vayne with the title "will it jungle" and it makes me really unconformable.

thank you very much

replies.body:
There's no in-game option to disable the content on the home page, unfortunately. I'm not aware of any other way you could disable them either.

Let me know if you have any questions.
